*suction* AHHHHH *thud*

AHH, where am I? Oh, back home. Nice.

Turns out I was an Aperture Science Artificial Personality Construct, and I got turned into the Cat Core. Don't know why.

But I'm back, but I could also be in a simulation, thinking I'm not. Uh oh, this is turning out to be a dream, AHHH-
Wasn't this a thread about Chobit's art?

Wasn't this a thread about Chobit's art?

Sure, lets play along.

Beautiful art chobit, do make more.

It's seems as if this thread is used for talking about Chobit's art whenever Chobit posts new images or someone has a question. The rest of the time, we talk about random off-topic things. Then someone makes a sub-thread for the off-topic discussion, it eventually dies out, and a new off-topic discussion begins on the main thread. This pattern appears to not have any end, and has repeated itself many times, both before and after the forum catastrophe, with a few occasional tweaks to the details. It is rumored that Chobit enjoys watching this and that it is all a secret ploy to keep her thread at the top of the page even if it's been a while since the last image.
Yes. It's all so simply. Wait no it's not, it's needlessly complicated.

It's seems as if this thread is used for talking about Chobit's art whenever Chobit posts new images or someone has a question. The rest of the time, we talk about random off-topic things. Then someone makes a sub-thread for the off-topic discussion, it eventually dies out, and a new off-topic discussion begins on the main thread. This pattern appears to not have any end, and has repeated itself many times, both before and after the forum catastrophe, with a few occasional tweaks to the details. It is rumored that Chobit enjoys watching this and that it is all a secret ploy to keep her thread at the top of the page even if it's been a while since the last image.

I actually enjoy the cycle. Chobit, initiate another cycle now please.

I actually enjoy the cycle. Chobit, initiate another cycle now please.

Sometimes, other people start the cycle.

Sometimes, other people start the cycle.

But it's much more fun when Chobits involved.

But it's much more fun when Chobits involved.

Everything is.

Everything is.
